code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Draggable from'react-draggable';import{ResizableBox}from'react-resizable';import'react-resizable/css/styles.css';import'./DraggableFrame.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DraggableFrame=_ref=>{let{title,src}=_ref;const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen),children:isOpen?"Hide ".concat(title):"Show ".concat(title)}),isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Draggable,{handle:".handle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"draggable-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResizableBox,{width:600,height:400,minConstraints:[300,200],maxConstraints:[1200,800],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"resizable-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"handle",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"iframe-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{src:src,width:"100%",height:"100%",style:{border:'none'},title:title})})]})})})})]});};export default DraggableFrame;
